loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza A. is from the village of Baybay in Migcanaway, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is 40 years old. Flordeliza is married and has 6 school-aged children. To make a living, Flordeliza owns and operates a videoke rental business. Flordeliza has been engaged in her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 4000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Flordeliza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Flordeliza has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5000 PHP from GDMPC. Flordeliza is requesting a new loan of 7000 PHP which will be used to invest in renovating the business. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Flordeliza from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To renovate her business

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar D. is a 23-years old rice farmer from Trento Agusan del Sur. He started his business since 2008. He is happy that he can earn money from his rice field so that he get married whenever he chooses.

He would like to ask for a loan of Php 8,000 from Community Economic Ventures Inc. He will use the loan to buy farm necessities and pay the laborers who work hard to prepare the land for planting. Receiving a loan is truly worthwhile because, otherwise, he doesn't have the money to support more business.

He has been a CEVI client since 2008. He said that his access to small loans from CEVI has helped his parents to provide for their needs.

loans.use: Farm financing

loans.name: Ma. Corazon

texts.en:
Ma. Corazon G. is from the village of San Jose in  Camiguin. She is 42 years old. Ma. Corazon is married and has 2 adult children. To make a living, Ma. Corazon owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) shop where she sells food and daily-use products in the local community. Ma. Corazon has been engaged in her business for over 1 years and earns approximately 5000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Ma. Corazon joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Ma. Corazon is requesting a new loan of 4000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the 2nd loan taken out by Ma. Corazon from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Isabel pertenece al Banco Comunal “San Juan de Tahuaco”  que esta ubicado en la comunidad de San Juan de Tahuaco del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 40 años de edad, ella esta separada de su esposo hace 4 años y es madre de 03, y estudio educación primaria completa, vive en la comunidad de San Juan de Tahuaco.

La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años es una socia fundadora del Banco Comunal su préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles  para la compra de ganado menor. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, con este préstamo la señora va a comprar ganado vacuno para yunta.

Su mayor deseo es comprar mas ganado y  ver profesionales a  sus hijos.

A ella le gustan las socializaciones con sus compañeras
texts.en:
Isabel belongs to the San Juan de Tahuaco Communal Bank which is located in the San Juan de Tahuaco District of Yunguyo in the Chucuito Province within the Department of Puno. She is 40 years old, separated, a mother of three, and completed primary education. She lives in the community of San Juan de Tahuaco. Isabel has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for many years and is a founding member of the Communal Bank. Her first loan of 300 nuevos soles was used to buy small livestock. Now she is requesting a loan of 1500 nuevos soles with which she will buy cattle for a yoke. Isabel's greatest hopes are to buy more livestock and to see her children become professionals. Isabel enjoys socializing with her bank partners.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Shimmin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For purchasing cattle

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz A. is from the village of San Jose in Camiguin. She is 57 years old. Luz is single. To make a living, Luz owns and  operates a sari-sari (variety) shop where she sells food and daily-use products in the local community. Luz has been engaged in her business for over 2 years and earns approximately 2000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Luz joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Luz has successfully repaid a previous loan of 4000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to purchase additional products to sell. Luz is requesting a new loan of 6000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offering. This loan will be the 2nd loan taken out by Luz from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase new items to sell

loans.name: Marible

texts.es:
La señora Maribel  pertenece al Banco Comunal “San Juan de Tahuaco”  que esta ubicado en la comunidad de San Juan de Tahuaco del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 43 años de edad, estado civil casada y es madre de 05, y estudio educación primaria completa, y vive en la comunidad de San Juan de Tahuaco.

La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años es una socia fundadora del Banco Comunal su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles  para la compra de ganado porcino. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 2000.00 Nuevos soles, con este préstamo la señora lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y ganado vacuno que vende en la feria de Yunguyo.

Su mayor deseo es dedicarse a la venta de ropa y poner su puesto en la Cuidad de Tacna y que sus hijos tengan una profesión.

A ella le gustan las reuniones y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maribel belongs to the community bank "San Juan de Tahuaco," which is located in the community San Juan de Tahuaco, Yunguyo district, Chucuito province, department of Puno. She is 43 years old, married, and a mother of five. She completed her primary education and lives in San Juan de Tahuaco. For years, Maribel has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement. She is a founding member of her community bank. Her first loan was for 300 soles for buying pigs. Currently she is asking for a loan of 2000 soles. With this loan, she will invest in buying clothes and cattle to sell in the Yunguyo market. Her biggest wishes are to work selling clothes and have a market stall in the city of Tacna, and she wants her kids to have a job. She likes parties and savings.

Translated from Spanish by Lydia Brantley, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying cattle and clothing

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
La señora Blanca  pertenece al Banco Comunal “San Juan de Tahuaco”  que esta ubicado en la comunidad de San Juan de Tahuaco del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 43 años de edad, estado civil viuda y es madre de 02, y estudio educación primaria completa, vive en la comunidad de San Juan de Tahuaco.

La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años es una socia fundadora del Banco Comunal su préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles  para la compra de ganado porcino y ovino. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 1200.00 Nuevos soles, con este préstamo la señora va comprar ganado vacuno para engorde, ella solo vende su ganado los días de feria ósea los domingos.

Su mayor deseo es darles educación a sus hijos, luego poner una tienda de abarrotes en Yunguyo.

A ella le gustan las reuniones y conversar de todo con sus compañeras

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado vacuno

loans.name: Moanh

texts.en: Moanh N. is a long-time businesswoman. She has been working in the handicraft trade since she was young. She weaves bamboo baskets, a skill she learned from her grandparents, and sells them buyers when she saves up 100 sets of basket. Moanh N. is married and seven children who are married and have started new homes. She now lives with her husband who assists with her in making and selling baskets. Moanh N. will be using her loan to replace the roof of her house, because it is cracking frequently. With the remainder of the loan, she will buy more raw materials.

loans.use: To replace the roof of her house

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Carmen es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor de la Caña”  que esta ubicado de el distrito de Plateria, Provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 51 años de edad, estado civil casada y madre de 02 hijos y tiene estudios de educación secundaria completa, vive en el distrito de Plateria.

Trabaja con el movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años no recuerda, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, para la compra de ganado menor. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de ganado vacuno que luego de mejorarlos los venderá en la feria dominical.

Su mayor sueño poder dedicarse a la cría de ganado y vender a los mayoristas.

A ella le gustan los ahorros y las reuniones.

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado vacuno.

loans.name: Ma.luisita

texts.en:
Ma.luisita O. is from the village of Mahinog in Camiguin. She is 40 years old. Ma.luisita is married and has 3 school-aged children. To make a living, Ma.luisita owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) shop where she sells food and daily- use products in the local community. Ma.luisita has been engaged in her business for over 2 years and earns approximately 5000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Ma.luisita joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Ma.luisita is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offering. This loan will be the 1st loan taken out by Ma.luisita from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy products to sell

loans.name: Yudith Luzmila

texts.es:
La señora Yudith es socia del Banco Comunal “24 de Junio”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, Provincia de El Collao, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 27 años de edad, estado civil casada y madre de 01 hijo, estudio educación superior completa, vive en la Parcialidad de Alinsuyo Ilave.

La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, hace varios años es una de las socias fundadoras,  su préstamo inicial fue de  S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el mismo que lo invirtió en la compra de verduras para venderlos en su puesto del mercado. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de ganando vacuno para engorde, la señora también se dedica a la venta  de sombreros en el mercado. 

Su deseo es poner una tienda de productos veterinarios e implementar un laboratorio químico.
A ella le gustan los ahorros y las reuniones.

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado vacuno.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
Mary Luz es socia del Banco Comunal “24 de Junio”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, Provincia de El Collao, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 22 años de edad, estado civil soltera no tiene hijos, estudio educación superior completa, pero no ejerce su profesión, vive en la Parcialidad de Alinsuyo Ilave.

La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, hace 8 meses,  su préstamo inicial fue de  S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, el mismo que lo invirtió en la compra de animales menores. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de jabones, champús, jaboncillos, betunes, pilas, etc., para aumentar la mercadería en su negocio ella tiene un puesto en el mercado.

Su deseo es tener un puesto de cabinas de Internet y locutorio  en Ilave.
A ella le gustan las reuniones y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Mary Luz is a member of the "June 24th" Communal Bank, located in Ilave District, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 22 years old and single with no children. She completed her higher education, but she hasn't put her studies into practice. She lives in the Alinsuyo Ilave area. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the past 8 months. Her first loan was for 500 soles, and she used the money to buy small animals. She is currently requesting a loan of 500 soles to buy soap, shampoo, shoe polish, batteries, etc., to increase the supply of merchandise she sells at her market stand. Her dream is to open a call center/Internet café in Ilave. Her favorite part of her communal bank are the group meetings and her savings account.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Staff

loans.use: Buy soap, shampoo, shoe polish, batteries

loans.name: Melita

texts.es:
Melita tiene 37 años, es madre soltera y vive junto a sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Ella es una mujer con muchos objetivos, por eso se esfuerza cada día en su trabajo, se dedica a la venta de ropa de segundo uso. Estas prendas las ofrece a sus amistades y vecinos, tanto al contado como al crédito, también viaja hasta algunos caseríos de su región para intercambiar sus prendas con productos comestibles (plátanos, yuca, maíz, fréjol, pescado, gallinas y otros), los mismos que revende de regreso. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 2 años y le va muy bien, adicionalmente, por las noches, trabaja en una pequeña casa de hospedaje como recepcionista. A Melita le gusta estar activa y trabaja por el bienestar de sus hijos, a quienes desea darles lo necesario para progresar en el futuro. 
Este es su 9no crédito con MFP, lo que le gusta de trabajar con su banco comunal es que entre todos los integrantes se comprenden, son responsables y solidarios. Con el dinero que ahora solicita comprará mayor cantidad de ropa para aumentar sus ventas y con ello sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Melita is 37 years old, a single mother and lives with her three children in her own house. She is a woman with many objectives, because of this she makes an effort every day in her work selling second hand clothes. She offers these clothes to her friends and neighbours for cash and credit. She also travels to other villages in the region to exchange her articles of clothing for edible products (plantains, cassava, corn, beans, fish, chicken and other items) which she resells on her return. She has been involved in this activity for two years and it is going very well for her. Additionally, at night she works in a small guesthouse as a receptionist. Melita likes to be active and work for the wellbeing of her children, who she wants to give everything they need to progress in the future. This is her ninth loan with MFP. What she likes about working with her community bank is that all the members understand each other and are responsible and supportive. With the money that she is now applying for she will buy a greater quantity of clothes to increase her sales and in so doing, her earnings.

Translated from Spanish by Suzanne Grasso, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase of merchandise

loans.name: Genara

texts.es:
La señora Genara es socia del Banco Comunal “Bartolina Sisa”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, Provincia de El Collao, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 46 años de edad, estado civil conviviente y es madre de 07 hijos (solo 2 a su cargo), La señora Genara no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, vive en el Barrio San Martín  Av. Republica 971.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 11 años,  su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el mismo que lo invirtió comprando ganado ovino. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 400.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de ganado ovino y ganado porcino, el que lo vende en las ferias semanales.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando para educar a sus hijos.

A ella le gustan los ahorros ya las  reuniones.

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado ovino y porcino.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga tiene 27 años, vive con su pareja, con la que tiene un pequeño de 3 añitos. Actualmente viven en casa de su suegra. Hace un año atrás tenía una pequeña bodega en un espacio que le brindó su suegra en su casa, pero no le era muy rentable porque competía con otras tiendas más grandes. Entonces decidió alquilar ese local como almacén a una empresa constructora y al notar que había muchos obreros trabajando allí, inició un negocio de venta de comida brindando desayunos y almuerzos a estos trabajadores, y por las noches vende comida al paso en la puerta de su casa. Con este negocio lleva un periodo de 8 meses y le está yendo muy bien. Además, a Olga le gusta la cocina, por lo que atiende con mucho ahínco a todos sus comensales. 
Este es su 4to préstamo con MFP, ella es parte de un banco comunal y está muy contenta porque todos los integrantes de su grupo se llevan muy bien, son coordinados y no hay problemas por falta de pago. El dinero que ahora solicita lo invertirá en su nuevo negocio de la venta de comida, comprando utensilios e ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en:
Olga is 27 years old and lives with her husband, with whom she has a little three-year-old. They currently live in her mother-in-law's house. One year ago she had a little grocery store in a space her mother-in-law gave her in the house, but it wasn't very profitable because it competed with much bigger stores. She decided to rent the space as a warehouse to a construction company, and, noticing that there were a lot of workers working there, she began a business selling breakfast and lunch to the workers. During the evenings, she sells food to-go from her front door. She's been doing this type of catering for 8 months and is doing very well. What's more, Olga likes to cook, which means she eagerly attends to all her diners. This is her fourth loan with MFP. She is part of a community bank and is very happy because all the members of her group get along very well. They are well-organized and don't have problems with missing payments. She will invest the money she is asking for in her new food-sale business, buying utensils and ingredients for preparing food.

Translated from Spanish by Lydia Brantley, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying utensils and ingredients for catering business

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del Banco Comunal “Bartolina Sisa”  que esta ubicado en el distrito D. Ilave, Provincia D. El Collao, Departamento D. Puno, ella tiene 41 años D. edad, estado civil casada y es madre D. 02 hijos, y estudio educación secundaria completa, vive en el Barrio San Martín  Av. Republica 1211.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años no recuerda,  su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el mismo que lo invirtió comprando abarrotes. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo D. S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra D. arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, fideos, etc. Para vender en su tienda, los días D. feria prepara comida para vender.

Su deseo es ser mayorista en ganadería para engorD. con todo tipo D. animales, para poder educar a sus hijos.

A ella le gustan las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the “Bartolina Sisa” communal bank, which is located in the Llave District, in El Collao Province, in Puno Department. She is 41 years old, is married, is the mother of 2 children, and studied through high school. She lives in the San Martín neighborhood on Republica Avenue. She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for several years, she doesn’t remember how many. Her first loan was for 300.00 PEN, which she used to purchase grocery items. She is currently requesting 1,000.00 PEN to buy rice, sugar, milk, cooking oil, noodles, etc., to sell in her store. On market days she makes food for sale. She would like to buy and sell livestock of all sorts for fattening, so that she can educate her children. She likes the meetings and informative speeches [at Movimiento Manuela Ramos].

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, milk, cooking oil, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
La señora Petrona es socia del Banco Comunal “Bartolina Sisa”  que esta ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, Provincia de El Collao, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 33 años de edad, estado civil casada y es madre de 05 hijos, y estudio educación primaria incompleta 3er grado, vive en el Barrio San José Jr. Copacabana 367.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años no recuerda,  su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el mismo que lo invirtió comprando cereales. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de combustible, para la venta en el mercado local.

Su deseo es poner una tienda de venta de alimento balanceado.

A ella le gustan  las charlas y las reuniones
texts.en:
Mrs. Petrona F. C. is a member of the Community Bank “Bartolina Sisa” which is located in the District of Ilave, Province of El Collao, Department of Puno. She is 33 years old, married with 5 children and a 3rd grade education. She lives in the neighborhood of San José Jr. Copacabana 367. She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos but does not remember exactly how many years; her original loan was of S/. 300 Nuevos Soles which she invested to buy cereals. She is now soliciting a loan of S/. 500 Nuevos Soles to buy fuel which she will sell in the local market; her wish is to establish a grocery store. She enjoys seminars and meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Carlos Morales, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fuel

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.en:
Cornelia B. is from the village of Tabo-o in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 60 years old. Cornelia is married and has 4 adult children. To make a living, Cornelia owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) store where she buys and sells fish to the local community. Cornelia has been engaged in her business for over 20 years and earns approximately 5,000.00 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2007, Cornelia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Cornelia has successfully repaid a previous loan of 20,000.00 PHP from GDMPC. Cornelia is requesting a new loan of 20000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the sixth loan taken out by Cornelia from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es:
La señora Saturnina es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuevo Porvenir” que esta ubicado en el distrito D. Puno, Provincia D. Puno, Departamento D. Puno, ella tiene 58 años D. edad, estado civil casada y es madre D. 05 hijos, La señora Saturnina estudio educación secundaria completa, vive en el Barrio Alto Santa Rosa jr. 30 D. Agosto 927.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 9 años,  su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra D. abarrotes para su tienda. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo D. S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra D. arroz, leche, fideos, verduras, huevos, jugos, etc., para su tienda, la señora Saturnina también venD. pescado en el mercado central D. Puno.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando para D. alguna manera ayudar a su nieto.
A ella le gustan las reuniones que dice son divertidas
texts.en:
Mrs. Saturnina is a member of the “Nuevo Provenir” (New Proceeds) Community Bank that is located in the district of Puno, in the Puno province, in the department of Puno. She is 58 years old, is married and is the mother of five children. Mrs. Saturnina has completed her secondary studies. She lives in the Community of Alto Santa Rosa Jr. 30 D. Agosto 927. She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for nine years. Her first loan was for 300.00 new soles, money that she invested in the purchase of groceries for her store. This time she is asking for a loan of 1500.00 new soles in order to buy rice, milk, noodles, vegetables, eggs, juice, etc. for her store. Mrs. Saturnina also sells fish in the central market of Puno. Her desire is to continue working in some manner in order to help her grandchild. She loves reunions that she says are very fun.

Translated from Spanish by Esther Levandoski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice, milk, noodles, vegetables, eggs, juice, etc.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La señora Elizabeth es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuevo Porvenir” que esta ubicado en el distrito de Puno, Provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 35 años de edad, estado civil conviviente y es madre de 02 hijos, estudio educación superior incompleta, vive en el Barrio Los Andes Jr. Ruiz Gallo 116.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 4 años,  su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra de lanas para la producción de artesanías. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 1700.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra de lana alpaca de diferentes colores, napa, y lana sintética, etc. Para la elaboración de artesanías en miniatura.

Su deseo es poner una tienda de venta de artesanías y poder exportar.
A ella le gusta la puntualidad y las reuniones
texts.en:
Mrs. Elizabeth is a member of the “Nuevo Provenir” (New Proceeds) Community Bank that is located in the district of Puno, in the Puno province, in the department of Puno. She is 35 years old, has a domestic partner and is the mother of two children. Her higher educational studies are not complete. She lives in the Barrio Los Andes Jr. Ruiz Gallo 116. She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for four years. Her first loan was for 300.00 new soles, money that she invested in the purchase of wool to be used to make folk art. This time she is asking for a loan of 1700 new soles in order to buy many colors of alpaca wool, cord and synthetic wool etc. This will be used to make small folk art objects. Her desire is to have a store where she can sell folk art. She would also like to export folk art. She likes punctuality and reunions.

Translated from Spanish by Esther Levandoski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy synthetic wool in many colors and alpaca wool.

loans.name: Vilma Brigida

texts.es:
La señora Brígida es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuevo Porvenir” que esta ubicado en el distrito de Puno, Provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 37 años de edad, estado civil casada y es madre de 04 hijos, La señora Saturnina estudio educación secundaria completa, vive en el Barrio Alto Santa Rosa jr. 30 de Agosto 927.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 7 años,  su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de artesanías en miniatura. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 1300.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra la compra de artesanías en miniatura, las mismas que los vende en las ferias patronales de la región.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando para poder construir su casita y darles educación a sus hijos.
A ella le gusta la  puntualidad y los encuentros.

loans.use: Para la compra de artesanias en miniatura.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora B. is from the village of Seti in Jimenez,Misamis Occidental. She is 32 years old. Flora is married and has 3 school-aged children. To make a living, Flora raises pigs. Flora is just starting this business.

In 2008, Flora joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Flora has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000.00 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to purchase additional animals. Flora is requesting a new loan of 3000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional animals. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Flora from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement her family's income. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional animals

loans.name: Roberta

texts.en:
Roberta G. is from the village of Alangilan in Camiguin Province. She is 39 years old. Roberta is married and has 3 school-aged children. To make a living, Roberta sells seafood, including fish and shrimp, in the local community. Roberta has been engaged in her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 5000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Roberta joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Roberta has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to purchase new items to expand product offering. Roberta is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the 3rd loan taken out by Roberta from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
La señora Fortunata es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuevo Porvenir” que esta ubicado en el distrito de Puno, Provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 52 años de edad, estado civil casada y es madre de 01 hijo, La señora Fortunata estudio educación secundaria completa, vive en el Barrio Santa Rosa Av. Circunvalación 1660.

Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 7 años,  su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de corte y confección. 

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 550.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra la compra de hilos, botones, cierres, etc., para su negocio de corte y confección, el cual atiende en su casa.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando ya que nos cuenta que le va muy bien y asi ayuda a su hijo.
A ella le gusta la  puntualidad y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Sra. Fortunata is a member of the Communal Bank “Nuevo Porvenir” (New Future), which is located in the District of Puno, Puno Province, Department of Puno. She is 52 years old, married, and the mother of 1 child. Sra. Fortunata completed her high school education and lives in the neighborhood of Santa Rosa Av. Circunvalación 1660.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 7 years. Her first loan of 300 soles was invested into her dressmaking business.

This time she has requested a loan of 550 soles to purchase thread, buttons, zippers, etc., for her business that she operates out of her home.

Fortunata hopes to continue working. She tells us that she is doing very well and would like to help her son. She enjoys the timeliness of her loans and her savings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase thread, buttons, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Eleuteria Benita

texts.es:
La señora Benita es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuevo Porvenir” que esta ubicado en el distrito de Puno, Provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 54 años de edad, estado civil separada y es madre de 02 hijos, ella  estudio educación secundaria completa, vive en el Barrio Santa Rosa.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando y darle una profesión a su segundo hijo.
A ella le gusta la  puntualidad y las charlas.

loans.use: Para la compra de carnes rojas,  carne de ave.

loans.name: Mechelyn

texts.en:
Mechelyn A. is from the village of Rizal in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 42 years old. Mechelyn is married. To make a living, Mechelyn sells soft drinks and liquor in the local community. Mechelyn has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 5,000.00 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2006, Mechelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Mechelyn has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7,000.00 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Mechelyn is requesting a new loan of 15000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Mechelyn from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La señora Luz Marina es socia del Banco Comunal “Nuevo Porvenir” que esta ubicado en el distrito de Puno, Provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, ella tiene 43 años de edad, estado civil conviviente y es madre de 03 hijos, ella  estudio educación superior técnica, vive en el Barrio Santa Rosa

En este momento ella solicito un préstamo de S/. 600.00 Nuevos soles, para la compra la compra de lana acrílica de colores, repuestos para maquina de tejer. Ella elabora prendas de vestir de abrigo.

Su deseo es poner una tienda de venta de lanas al por mayor en Puno.
A ella le gustan las reuniones y los ahorros
texts.en:
Mrs. Luz Marina es a member of the Community Bank New Future which is located in the district of Puno, province of Puno, department of Puno. She is 43 years old, married, and has three children. She completed post-secondary technical studies, and she lives in Santa Rosa neighborhood.

She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for eight years. Her first loan was for 300 new Soles. She invested the money in her handicrafts business.

She is now applying for a loan of 600 new Soles for the purchase of colored acrylic wools and replacement parts for her sewing machine. With these materials she makes overcoats.

Her wish is to open a shop and sell wool wholesale.

She likes attending meetings and saving money.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of colored acrylic wool and replacements parts for sewing machine.

loans.name: Serina

Serina C. is from the village of Tabo-o in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is 52 years old. Serina is married and has 4 school-aged children. To make a living, Serina plants, harvests, and sells rice. Serina has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2008, Serina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Serina has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10,000.00 PHP from GDMPC. This previous loan was used to purchase fertilizers. Serina is requesting a new loan of 20000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers . This loan will be the fourth loan taken out by Serina from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.
